entry.title: Realizing the potential of Armenian entrepreneurship

media:group.media:title: Realizing the potential of Armenian entrepreneurship
media:group.media:description:
Christopher Dedeyan, the founder of Dedeyan Entreprises, sat down with CivilNet to talk about his companyโs plans to assist and promote entrepreneurs in Armenia. Dedeyan also discussed the relationship between entrepreneurship and equality, as well as the entrepreneurial spirit of immigrant communities in the West.

entry.title: At least 2 Armenian soldiers killed, 14 injured in Azerbaijan drone attacks

media:group.media:title: At least 2 Armenian soldiers killed, 14 injured in Azerbaijan drone attacks
media:group.media:description:
Tensions are flaring again in Karabakh. Azerbaijani units used drones, grenade launchers and anti-aircraft weapons in the direction of Armenian positions on Wednesday, according to the Artsakh Defense Army. Karabakh forces have reported two deaths. At least 14 more Armenian servicemen suffered injuries in the attacks.

media:group.media:description:
ีีฃีธีฝีฟีธีฝีซ 3-ีซีถ ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีกีฟีตีกีถีซ ีคีกีฟีกึีกีถีซ ีคีกีฟีกีพีธึ ีีถีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีีกึีฟีซึีธีฝีตีกีถีจ ีธึีธีทีฅึ ีฅึีฅึ ีกีดีฝีธีพ ีฏีกีฌีกีถีกีพีธึีฅีฌ ีจีถีคีคีซีดีกีคีซึ ีฃีธึีฎีซีน, ยซิฑีิฑียป ีฐีซีดีถีกีคึีกีดีซ ีฐีซีดีถีกีคีซึ ิฑีพีฅีฟีซึ ีีกีฌีกีขีตีกีถีซีถึ ีึีทีกีฃึีกีพ ีง, ีธึ ีถีกีญึีกีถ ีกีตีค ีธึีธีทีดีกีถ ีฏีกีตีกึีธึีดีจ ีคีกีฟีกีญีกีฆีจ ีดีซีปีถีธึีคีฅีฌ ีงึ ีฃึีกีพ ีฏีซึีกีผีฅีฌ ึ ีีกีฌีกีขีตีกีถีซีถ ีฉีธีฒีถีฅีฌ ีกีฆีกีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีดีฅีป, ีซีฝีฏ ีีกีฌีกีขีตีกีถีซ ึีกีฝีฟีกีขีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีญีธึีดีขีจ ีกีผีกีปีกึีฏีฅีฌ ีงึ 10 ีดีฌีถ ีคึีกีด ีฝีกีฐีดีกีถีกีนีกึีจ, ีซีถีนีบีฅีฝ ีถีกึ ีญีถีคึีฅีฌ ีงึ ีฐีซีดึ ีจีถีคีธึีถีฅีฌ ีดีฅีฏ ีฟีกีฝีถีตีกีฏีซึ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีฅึีกีทีญีกีพีธึีกีฃึีฅึีจึ ีีกีฌีกีขีตีกีถีจ ีฏีกีฌีกีถึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีธึีธีทีดีกีถ ีฐึีกีบีกึีกีฏีธึีดีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีฅึ, ีฉีฅ ีซึ ีฐีกีถีคีฅีบ ีกีฏีถีฐีกีตีฟ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีฅีฟีกีบีถีคีธึีด ีง ีซึีกีฏีกีถีกึีพีธึีดึ

media:group.media:description:
On August 1, from 9 am, Azerbaijani forces attempted a major incursion across the line of contact in several sections into Nagorno-Karabakh. CivilNet contributor and analyst Benyamin Poghosyan discusses what Azerbaijanโs strategy is and why Azerbaijanโs growing strategic significance may be changing Russia and the EUโs attitude towards Armenia and Nagorno-Karabakh.

entry.title: Lessons for Armenian tech success from around the world

media:group.media:title: Lessons for Armenian tech success from around the world
media:group.media:description:
Jumoke Dada, the CEO and founder of Taeillo, sat down with CivilNet to talk about the importance of the FemInno conference, which took place in Yerevan on July 30-31. FemInno, the first women in tech conference held in the region, seeks to showcase and empower women in business, science, and technology. Dada also shared her own journey as a female entrepreneur in Nigeria, and how she incorporated tech into her company, Taeillo, an e-commerce furniture and lifestyle brand based in Lagos.

entry.title: Former Armenian foreign minister reportedly denied entry to Karabakh

media:group.media:title: Former Armenian foreign minister reportedly denied entry to Karabakh
media:group.media:description:
๐Heritage party founder and former Armenian foreign minister Raffi Hovhannisyan has reportedly been banned from entering Nagorno-Karabakh. ๐The residents of Turkeyโs Kars are in favor of opening the border with Armenia, according to Turkish news site Bianet. ๐Armenia received nearly $266 million in transfers from Russia in May, the highest amount Armenian banks have ever recorded from any country in a month.
